entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.5°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 54 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
